Aside from being a former Democratic U.S. senator from Virginia , Webb was a highly decorated combat Marine in Vietnam , and later served as Secretary of the Navy .
Tthe fact that Webb stepped away from the U.S. Senate on his own terms implies he 's not just some politician .
And his history of being a Democrat who can work with - and stylistically appeal to - Republicans would potentially be a plus in a general election .
In this regard , Webb would , in a sense , be able to run for Obama 's third term while also ( symbolically , at least ) getting to run against Obama .
He could tap into the anti-corporate , populist message that has elevated Elizabeth Warren , while simultaneously appealing to the good ol ' boy red - state Democrats in places like Iowa .
